description:
Luffy and his gang of outlaws cause a commotion on Level Four, Blackbeard`s arrival leads to the release of the prison`s most feared inmate, and Ace gazes upon the great blue sky for what could be the very last time!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Even More Chaos! Here Comes Blackbeard Teech!
Le chaos s`accentue : L`invasion de "Barbe Noire" Teach !
Ещё больше хаоса! Вторжение Тича Чёрной бороды!
المزيد من الفوضى! ها قد أتى اللّحية السّوداء تيتش!
さらなる混乱! 黒ひげ・ティーチ襲来!
